SummaryEnglish: This movie tells a story of young people from 'Ant tribe' in Beijing. By tell the story of these young people, The Movie 'Tang Jia Ling' shows the psychological changes of college graduates. It reflects their confusion about future and love. The movie chooses 'Ant tribe' to show a unique aspect of the Chinese society. It encourages all the young people facing problems to learn from the 'Ant tribe' spirit and strive for a bright future.
